name: Don't melt! (MannCha)
description:
Submission for My First Game Jam: Winter 2020

-How to play-

In this short platformer, you play a melting ice cube that eats popsicles to stay alive. 

-Controls-

  • Use the arrow keys to move.
  • Press Spacebar to jump.

-Tips-

  • You'll melt faster if you keep moving.
  • Do not eat a popsicle if you are already full. It's better to keep it for when you need health.

-Software used-

  • GameMaker Studio 2
  • Fl Studio (Kirby dreamland 3 + Kirby 64 soundfonts for music, Magical8BitPlug for sound effects)
